transcript:
Customer: Hello.

Executive: Hello.

Customer: Hello.
Executive: Yes hi good afternoon Rajat ji baat kar rahe hain.
Customer: Ji baat kar raha hun.
Executive: Hi Rajat ji actually Krishna Interior ki call kiya tha aapko maine main Naveen baat kar raha tha India Mart doctor se kaise hain sir.
Customer: Sir bahut jyada pareshan hun aap logon se.
Executive: Bataye Rajat sir kya issue aa raha hai sir.
Customer: Are sir wo main buyleads ko dekh raha hun buyleads bilkul bekar aa rahi hai pehli baat aa hi nahi rahi hai matlab meri buyleads ab post hi nahi ho pa rahi hai aap logon ke side se meri 20-22 buyleads waste ho jati hai har hafte.
Hmm.
Customer: Mujhe buyleads aap log post hi nahi kar pa rahe ho to hum consume kahan se karenge pehli baat to ye ho gayi theek hai.
Executive: Ji.
Customer: Dusri baat dusri baat ye pata nahi kis bewakoof ne mera catalog banaya kitchen ko kuchan likh rakha hai usne usko kitchen ki spelling nahi aati kaise likhni chahiye.
Hmm.
Customer: Ab bataiye aapke product ki baat kar rahe hain aap.
Customer: Haan main apne product main apne catalog ki baat kar raha hun. Jahan kitchen hona chahiye wahan kuchan likh ke rakha hai usko kitchen ki spelling nahi aati hai bataiye kya impact jayega kya impact jayega customer ke upar ki kaun sa bewakoof bana rakha hai website usko kitchen ki spelling nahi aati hai.
Executive: Ji ji theek hai product ka naam bataiye kya hai.
Customer: Koi modular kitchen itna maine dekha tha usme kitchen ko usne kuchan likh ke rakha hua hai.
Executive: Modern wooden kachina modular kitchen aise hai kya kuch sir.
Customer: Haan kuch aise karke kitchen ki spelling usme galat hai ek ek logon ne hume screenshot de kar ke bheja tha abhi wo phone mere paas hi nahi warna main aapko wo share karwa deta.
Executive: Nahi product mein aapke to aisa nahi dikh raha sir aap online hai kya abhi.
Customer: Nahi abhi to online nahi hai lekin aap hume 2 baje aaj hum pure mood mein baithe hain Naveen sir aaj 2 baje ke baad aap hume call kariye aapko hum online milke milte hain abhi aaj main sari cheezon par discuss karunga.
Executive: Haan bilkul bilkul theek hai hum karte hain sir lunch ke baad mein 3 baje call karte hain usse baat karte hain.
Customer: Theek theek theek theek hai theek hai.
Executive: Theek hai okay.
Executive: Okay.
summary:
Concerns:

- Buyleads are useless and not getting posted.

- Catalog has incorrect spelling for "kitchen".



Resolution:

- Executive will call back at 3 PM.



Next Steps: 

- Executive to call back at 3 PM.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, catalog, spelling, kitchen
